üèÜ UPGRADE PLAN ‚Äî Which AI at Which Stage of Your Startup

Stage 1: Prototype (0‚Äì10k requests per month)

Use:

‚úî Llama 3.1 Local OR Gemini Flash 2.0

Cost:

Free (local)

Or ‚Çπ260/month (Gemini)

Reason:

Low traffic

Budget saving

Good enough for early tests



Stage 2: MVP / Early Users (10k‚Äì100k requests per month)

Switch to:

‚≠ê GPT-4o-mini

Cost:

‚Çπ645 to ‚Çπ6450 per month

Reason:

Higher mapping accuracy

Better autofill logic

Stable JSON outputs

Can handle messy forms

Needed before production launch



Stage 3: Production (100k‚Äì500k requests per month)

Use:

‚≠ê GPT-4o-mini

OR

‚≠ê Gemini Flash + GPT-4o-mini hybrid

Cost:

‚Çπ6450 to ‚Çπ32,000

Flow:

Gemini Flash ‚Üí cheap classification

GPT-4o-mini ‚Üí mapping + reasoning (core)

This reduces cost by 40‚Äì60%.



Stage 4: Enterprise Scale (500k‚Äì1M+ requests per month)

Mix:

‚úî GPT-4o-mini for mapping

‚úî Gemini Flash for basic steps

‚úî Local Llama for caching repeated forms

Cost:

‚Çπ32k to ‚Çπ1L per month(based on traffic)



üß† FINAL RECOMMENDATION (For Your Project)

Use GPT-4o-mini as the main AI

because:

Best mapping accuracy

Best for complex forms

Lowest cost for high intelligence

Perfect for your MCP + Playwright flow

Works with RAG

Expected monthly cost:

For 10,000 requests ‚Üí ‚Çπ645

For 50,000 requests ‚Üí ‚Çπ3,225

For 100,000 requests ‚Üí ‚Çπ6,450

Extremely affordable.
